item.title: Why isn't this working, A Delta Problem
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

So im trying to fix my range and basically everything is working except no damage is displayed, gfx emotes everything work just no damage,

[code]if (UseBow) {
if(GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 6) == false){
HasArrows = false;
CheckArrows();
newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
newWalkCmdX[0] = newWalkCmdY[0] = tmpNWCX[0] = tmpNWCY[0] = 0;
getNextPlayerMovement();
toX = absX;
toY = absY;
AttackingOn2.createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 70, getarrowgfxnow(), 43, 31, -

AttackingOn-1);
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 70, getarrowgfxnow(), 43, 31, -AttackingOn-1);
//CalculateRange();
hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit());
//drawback();
}
if(specOn && specialAmount >= 75) {
AttackingOn2.createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 60, 249, 43, 31, -AttackingOn-1);
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 60, 249, 43, 31, -AttackingOn-1);
} else {
toX = absX;
toY = absY;
AttackingOn2.createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 70, getarrowgfxnow(), 43, 31, -

AttackingOn-1);
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 70, getarrowgfxnow(), 43, 31, -AttackingOn-1);
//CalculateRange();
hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit());
//drawback();
}
}[/code]

So thats basically it, you dont even got to spoon feed me if you dont want to just like hint at a statement or somthing, I was thinking it had something to do with

                hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit());

but I dont see any errors with that statement, so help is desired.

Read full topic
